attributes.action: build a house for the wolverhampton ring road tramp
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Polish Jo has been living in solitude in the deathly hallows of the Wolverhampton ring road for many years. We urge the primeminister to build this war veteran a permanant home so that he no longer has to face the depths of despair during the winter months.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
